About.title: About me
About.description: I'm a software developer with over two years of experience, specializing in front-end development. Graduated as a Full Stack Developer, I enjoy creating modern and efficient solutions. I recently moved to Switzerland, where I am continuing to develop my skills while adapting to a new environment.

Recommendations.title: Testimonials
Recommendations.description: Explore the whole collection of open-source web components and elements built with the utility classes from Tailwind

tano.headline: Founder & CEO of MUSURE world
tano.text:
Nico is one of the best players I have had the pleasure to work with! 
 He always understands the problems, and he is always ready to solve them with a Lean perspective!
 I'm looking forward to keeping working with him!

fer.headline: Graphic, Multimedia & Product Designer
fer.text:
He was a great partner, with solid knowledge and proactivity in seeking solutions. 
 His ability to work in a team and communication with other disciplines strengthened the creation of the solutions we needed

giu.headline: Project Management Profesional & Scrum Master Profesional
giu.text:
Great analytical skills and assertive in explaining technical issues. 
 A young and professional agilist threving the best in every Sprint.

lino.headline: Creative Director, Producer, Digital & Social Media Strategist
lino.text:
Nico has high skills as a developer. Always attentive, responsive and proactive in solving any problem.
 Our product grew thanks to his great contributions and insights.
 A pleasure to work with you Nico!

agus.headline: Full Stack Developer
agus.text:
A very proactive person willing to work as a team player and collaborator. 
 Able to face any challenge to continue growing and developing as a professional.
